sentences.sContent: The first silkworm diseases began to appear in 1845, creating an epidemic.
sentences.sContent_eng: The first silkworm diseases began to appear in 1845, creating an epidemic.
sentences.sCn: 1845年，首批桑蚕疾病开始出现，并引起了一次流行。

sentences.sContent: An epidemic of several silkworm diseases caused production to fall, especially in France, where the industry never recovered.
sentences.sContent_eng: An epidemic of several silkworm diseases caused production to fall, especially in France, where the industry never recovered.
sentences.sCn: 而几种桑蚕疾病的流行导致了丝绸产品下滑，特别在法国，丝绸工业再也没有恢复。

remMethod.val: silk(蚕丝) + worm(虫) → 吐蚕丝的虫 → 蚕

trans.tranOther: a type of  caterpillar  which produces silk thread
